game.name: Zootopia Nick Doctor
game.description:
Poor Nick Wilde has got a terrible injury today, and is surrounded by a lot of sufferings. He rushed to the nearest hospital, but could not find any help. You are his best friend and a good doctor as well, so he decided to call you for help. Are you ready to help him out? Join Zootopia Nick Doctor game and be prepared to give your helping hands to your friend when he needs it the most! Avoid wasting your time as his pain is unbearable!

This accident occurred when Nick was chasing the criminal. Now it is your responsibility to treat and cure the injuries of Nick in this brand new doctor game. First start removing all the objects from the injuries of Nick. Once it is done, make sure that you clean all his wounds and you use the magical cream on all the areas affected from the sudden injury. Do not forget to strap up his wounds properly and give them the needful bandage. Put alcohol on all his injuries with the help of cotton!

Use the string to stitch all the cut parts in this one of the best girls games! Make sure to use the two types of bandages to his injuries. Your good knowledge about doctoring skills will help Nick recover fast. He trusts on your abilities, so try to attempt this task with a cool mind and full of confidence. Good luck to do your best and have a blast in kids surgery games that are available for free to play online on atmegame.com, no download required!
